attributes.action: Scrap plans to charge students for the use of Online Catch-Up Tv
attributes.background: The Government have decided to change the TV licensing rules so that students will have to pay the £145.50 TV license in order to carry on watching BBC iPlayer Catch Up services. I believe this isn't right, this should be stopped or at least the TV license price should be lowered.

rejection.details:
It's not clear whether you want everyone to be able to watch the iPlayer without a TV licence, or whether you would like a specific exemption for students. 

You could start a new petition asking clearly for the specific action you want.
